abstract: liberum capital reaffirms `` hold '' rating for qinetiq group .
article: qinetiq group 's stock had its `` hold '' rating reissued by stock analysts at liberum capital in a research report issued on friday . they presently have a gbx 230 target price on the stock . liberum capital 's price target indicates a potential upside of 6.09 % from the stock 's previous close . qq has been the subject of a number of other reports . jpmorgan chase & co. . upgraded shares of qinetiq group to an `` overweight '' rating and set a gbx 290 target price for the company in a research note on monday , october 2nd .

barclays restated an `` overweight '' rating and issued a gbx 265 price objective on shares of qinetiq group in a research note on monday , december 18th . finally , berenberg bank upgraded shares of qinetiq group to a `` buy '' rating and reduced their price objective for the stock from gbx 310 to gbx 235 in a research note on wednesday , november 22nd . one equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating , two have given a hold rating and two have assigned a buy rating to the company 's stock .

qinetiq group currently has an average rating of `` hold '' and an average target price of gbx 247.60 . qinetiq group traded up gbx 1.90 during midday trading on friday , reaching gbx 216.80 . 2,291,515 shares of the company 's stock were exchanged , compared to its average volume of 1,850,000 . the firm has a market capitalization of $ 1,230.00 and a pe ratio of 903.33 . qinetiq group has a 1 year low of gbx 195.10 and a 1 year high of gbx 322.90 . in related news , insider michael harper bought 5,000 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction that occurred on monday , november 20th .

the company 's segments include emea services and global products . the emea services segment provides technical assurance , test and evaluation , and training services . it provides research and advice in specialist areas , such as concept of command , control , communications , computers , intelligence , surveillance and reconnaissance , weapons and energetics , cyber security and procurement advisory services . receive news & ratings for qinetiq group daily - enter your email address below to receive a concise daily summary of the latest news and analysts ' ratings for qinetiq group and related companies with marketbeat .
